dj2.core

Class Artist

  • java.lang.Object
    • dj2.core.Artist
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Band

    public class Artist
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an artist with all information related to him, in addition to his singles, concerts, and albums
    Author:
    salahazekour

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Artist(java.lang.String artist, java.lang.String biography)
      The class takes a name, and biography to successfully create the artist
